definition: غد see غدو غد gad the morrow, the following day; غدا gadan tomorrow; on a future day, sometime in the future │ في غد, من غد on the following day, tomorrow; في الغد do.; on a future day, sometime in the future; بعد غد day after tomorrow; في ذات غد see ذات غد gadda i (gadd) to fester, suppurate (wound) IV do.; to hasten, speed, make forced marches │ اغد (في) السير (sair) to ran fast, hasten, hurry, speed
